description: This file defines a React-style Qwik component for a music streaming application's front-end. It manages state related to tracks, playlists, search, and playback controls, including filtering tracks, starting/stopping playback, and UI rendering for browsing tracks and controlling playback.

methods.name: fmtTime
methods.description: Formats a number of seconds into a MM:SS string.

methods.name: togglePlay$
methods.description: Toggles playback state between play and pause.

methods.name: playTrack$
methods.description: Sets the current track and starts playback.

methods.name: nextTrack$
methods.description: Advances to the next track in the filtered list or mock data.

methods.name: prevTrack$
methods.description: Goes back to the previous track in the filtered list or mock data.

methods.name: onTimeUpdate$
methods.description: Updates playback progress when the audio player's time updates.

methods.name: onEnded$
methods.description: Automatically plays the next track when current track ends.
